attributes.action: Set a UK usury limit to prevent lenders exploiting the vulnerable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An usury limit of say the current Bank of England base rate +20% (ie effectively 25%APR) would prevent lenders from being able to loan money at levels of interest that are unaffordable and unfair. Some companies are currently charging ridiculous rates of interest hidden by dubious marketing slogans like "affordable monthly payments".
